in israel life and death moments are being faced constantly today right now
in the past year there have been more emergency medical calls made than ever before in the nations history
paramedics and emergency medical technicians must respond to every single call for help they must triage the injured stop the bleeding from fatal wounds restart hearts that have ceased to beat evacuate critical covid patients and so much more
this work cannot stop nor can it slow and to do it they need an overflowing stream of medical supplies and equipment in israel these things are provided almost exclusively by the generous donations of others largely from friends in america
when you make a donation of any amount to help provide the urgent professional medical supplies that israelis cannot live without we will send you one of our israel firstaid kits as a token of our appreciation
this kit contains a variety of household firstaid supplies such as multiple types of personal bandages gauze tape tweezers alcohol prep pads scissors safety gloves cotton swabs and more
when you give to help israels emergency response teams save the most critically wounded and desperate patients we want to give you this kit to help in the small emergencies of your life
